txt.en: Give the crystal torches to dwarf explorers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Now I shall be able to see in the dark quite well!'
Gave crystal torches to dwarf explorers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A forge can be found in Vérnozal.\n\nYou should forge crystal torches for dwarf explorers at the forge.
Crystals and metal ingots can be found near the forge in Vérnozal.\n\nYou should collect crystals and metal ingots to make crystal torches.

'Ah, you have constructed the torches well from my plans! Thank you for giving them to the other explorers. It is always an honour to work together!\n\n'Take care when exploring Gundabad, my friend. I will be going no further than Máttugard for now. My services are needed here.'

'Ah, good [placeholder]! If you are going to explore Gundabad, you might want to take the advice of humble Rúzat! I have seen the pit of Ablak-zibdîn and know its depths and far-flung corners are dark indeed. You and other explorers must make sure to have some proper light! Here, take these plans for a crystal torch. You should be able to find what you need to make them in the Hall of Vérnozal. If you would be kind to make more than you need, I am sure the other explorers would be grateful to receive one. I would make these torches myself but my crafting skills are not anywhere near the prowess of great [placeholder]!'
Explorers in Gundabad will need a way to light their path as they search the ancient depths beneath the mountains.
Rúzat can be found at Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Rúzat.
Dwarf explorers can be found in Vérnozal.\n\nYou should give the crystal torches you forged to the dwarf explorers.
